
# ** THIS FILE IS AUTOGENERATED, CHANGE MAKEFILE.AM.PY INSTEAD **
# include not needed for CMake
# include $(top_srcdir)/common.mk
# tests where program to build and program to run are equal
set(NORMALTESTS  compare_hmm compare_msfem compare_lodm)
# list of tests to run
set(TESTS  ${NORMALTESTS})
# programs just to build when "make check" is used
set(check_PROGRAMS  ${NORMALTESTS})
set(LDFLAGS  -lboost_timer -lboost_chrono -lboost_filesystem -lboost_system ${BOOST_LDFLAGS})
set(CXXFLAGS  ${BOOST_CPPFLAGS} ${DUNE_CPPFLAGS}
    -DGRIDDIM=${GRIDDIM} -D${GRIDTYPE} ${ALL_PKG_CPPFLAGS})
add_executable(compare_hmm compare_hmm.cc)
add_executable(compare_msfem compare_msfem.cc)
add_executable(compare_lodm compare_lodm.cc)
set(EXTRA_DIST  ${SOURCES} compare_hmm.dgf compare_msfem.dgf compare_lodm.dgf)
set(CLEANFILES  *.gcda *.gcno semantic.cache  dgfparser.log)
# include not needed for CMake
# include $(top_srcdir)/am/global-rules
# ** THIS FILE IS AUTOGENERATED, CHANGE MAKEFILE.AM.PY INSTEAD **
foreach(i ${TESTS})
  add_test(${i} ${i})
endforeach(i ${TESTS})
# We do not want want to build the tests during make all
# but just build them on demand
add_directory_test_target(_test_target)
add_dependencies(${_test_target} ${TESTS} ${COMPILE_XFAIL_TESTS})
